title: KüA Plan Entry
description: A single entry of the KüA plan

id.description: The unique identifier of the entry

title.description: The subject of the planned KüA (or blocker)

description.description: A longer description of the planned KüA.

room.description: List of unique identifiers of the rooms this entry is valid for.

responsiblePerson.description: Name of the persons responsible for this KüA or blocker

isBlocker.description: if present and true, this is not a real KüA announcement, but instead an informative entry to mark this time slot (in this room or any room) as blocked for some reason.

residueOf.description: If present, this is not a KüA announcement, but instead informs about another plan entry (by its unique identifier), which has been here before.
